title: Ex-Gold (Currently High Silver) Support main LF Clash Team
body:
Just Decided that I should start looking for a team to join for when Clash comes out later in the year.
If you're silver or gold and you're looking for a support main to join your team, hit me up.

I got discord and I usually play on weekends (Fridays/Saturdays/Sundays) since I have work during the week.
Add me ingame if you want to discuss anything else.

**IGN: HealBot Soraka**

_P.S don't let my name fool you, I'm just trying to get to gold by only playing Soraka, I can actually play multiple supports._
